Thanks! Its less of a profile and more of an amateur-file...
Weirdest part of that movie was that it featured a [Neon Genesis Evangelion action figure](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5FmFaK7pMU).
Oh man, You're right! I must not have read the assembly instructions!
Think of all the time you save!
Awesome effects in the second last panel!
Nice one! Did the cat learn to levitate somewhere between calculus and laser?!
Such painful detailing on the nail, truly horrifying.

They almost broke through to finally become things OUT of squares... I guess we'll never know.
Nice work toying with the perspective like that though!
In the first panel he is just egging him on...
Who was KO'd, the bear or the sake?!
Is that guy stabbing a pile of corpses?
Nice style with the '-1' pinging off the armor!
The tumbleweeds are a nice touch.
Consistent pun work, you seem to be running with a nautical theme lately!
The expression in the last panel makes it work - keep at it!

VR Headsets - PSVR brought motion sickness to the masses.
Snap Spectacles - Hard to get, easy to accidentally film yourself on the toilet.
Overwatch - Plz nerf Mei.
Smartphones - Now with less headphone jacks, more dongles and bonus explosions.
Laptops - Apple embraces USB C and users endure the dongle life.
Delivery Drones - Just in time to deliver more dongles!
Pokemon GO - Overcame early server issues to convince a generation to venture outside once again.

In her defense, much of her wishlist is more database textbooks!

Hi, The headphone jack format has been around since some time in the 1800s. So the guy in the comic assumes a device without the jack would have to be from the 1800s or earlier.
Hope that helps clear it up!

WRITING.TITLE: My home life summed up in a Venn diagram.
My home life summed up in a Venn Diagram.
Err... umm... it's not what it looks like?

WRITING.TEXT:
Tech 2015:
[Hoverboards](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/133259968379/they-see-me-rollin) - Fell short of back-to-the-future expectations.
[VR](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/128969636724/fantasy-world) [Headsets](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/132785036289/virtual-walk) - The reality is virtual, the hype is real.
Bluetooth headphones - Slightly improved battery life.
[Smartphones](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/133401607119/in-app-purchases) - Slightly faster thinner than last year's version.
[Smartwatches](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/131408841374/fitness-tracker) - Receive photo updates of your friends' dinner direct to your wrist.
[Tablets](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/130396720599/modern-family) - Now with added keyboard and stylus, but definitely not a laptop.
[Personal](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/132016844109/a-trick-for-treats) [Drones](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/134458136632/drone-delivery) - Now with built-in camera to document you crashing your new hoverboard.
Nuka Cola - Same old Fallout, now with added [Sims](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/131794292279/realistic-videogames)!
BB8 - Initially ridiculed then suddenly adored by all.
Hashtags - #stillhardtoknowwherewordsstartandend

Tech 2015:
[Hoverboards](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/133259968379/they-see-me-rollin) - Fell short of back-to-the-future expectations.
[VR](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/128969636724/fantasy-world) [Headsets](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/132785036289/virtual-walk) - The reality is virtual, the hype is real.
Bluetooth headphones - Slightly improved battery life.
[Smartphones](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/133401607119/in-app-purchases) - Slightly faster thinner than last year's version.
[Smartwatches](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/131408841374/fitness-tracker) - Receive photo updates of your friends' dinner direct to your wrist.
[Tablets](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/130396720599/modern-family) - Now with added keyboard and stylus, but definitely not a laptop.
[Personal](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/132016844109/a-trick-for-treats) [Drones](http://theverynearfuture.com/post/134458136632/drone-delivery) - Now with built-in camera to document you crashing your new hoverboard.

WRITING.TEXT: Good point! I have tweaked the animation a bit.

Thanks for the kind feedback! If you want to see more, follow TVNF via the [Doot Com](http://www.theverynearfuture.com), [Instacrum](https://instagram.com/theverynearfuture/) or [Trotter](https://twitter.com/tvnfcomic)
A good point, but you would not get data of an appropriately elevated heart-rate and you would have to drive dangerously slowly to maintain a believable speed.

Thanks! I have only recently started this tech-themed comic. You can also follow it via [Web](http://www.theverynearfuture.com) / [Instagram](https://instagram.com/theverynearfuture/) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tvnfcomic)!
